explains: adj. 雷鸣般的，声音很大的；面色阴沉的，怒气冲冲的；重大的，强有力的

sentences.en: They greeted him with thunderous applause.
sentences.cn: 他们以雷鸣般的掌声欢迎了他。

sentences.en: His performance was met with thunderous applause.
sentences.cn: 他的表演获得了雷鸣般的掌声。

sentences.en: No sooner had Mo Yan stepped on the stage than the audience broke into thunderous applause.
sentences.cn: 莫言一上台，观众就爆发出雷鸣般的掌声。
